name: Offsprout Page Builder
author: Offsprout

sections.description:
What Is the Offsprout Page Builder?

Simply put, Offsprout is the first WordPress page builder built specifically for design agencies and freelancers. And it is white-labeled out of the box.

While every other page builder focuses on being the best tool for a non-technical person to build their own website, Offsprout’s sole focus is helping design agencies and freelancers rapidly build and manage client sites.

Offsprout Page Builder Features

  • Tons of different module types from basic text and images, to more complex feature grids and logo groups.
  • Unsplash stock photo integration with over 800,000 images
  • Centralized style management that allows to you update fonts, colors, and even button style and row/section style throughout your site from a single place
  • Saves all content as plain HTML, which means no live rendering and super-fast page load speed
  • Complex row/section backgrounds with images, gradients, image screens, and videos.
  • Mobile-friendly, responsive layouts
  • Add your own CSS
  • Does not use shortcodes to render content
  • However, you can use shortcodes in the text module and they\’ll render live in the editor
  • Works with Pages, Posts, and Custom Post Types

Offsprout Module Types

  • Text
  • Image
  • Video
  • Button
  • Features
  • Quote
  • List
  • Testimonials
  • Tabs
  • Accordion
  • Gallery
  • Logo Group
  • Map
  • Separator
  • Side by Side
  • WP Widget
  • Embed
  • Shortcode (Can also use shortcodes in any text area)
  • With lots more in Pro…

Offsprout Pro

Add more module types, and control exactly what your users can edit with the Builder Role creator in Offsprout Pro upgrade.

Offsprout Theme

Design your entire site, including headers, footers, sidebars, and more. Add navigation and comments section modules. Build fully designed sites in just 5 minutes with the Site Grower with the Offsprout Theme.

[https://www.browserstack.com/images/layout/browserstack-logo-600×315.png Browser testing done with BrowserStack]
sections.installation:
1. Install Offsprout either via the WordPress plugin directory or by uploading the files to your server at wp-content/plugins.

  2. After activating Offsprout, navigate to the settings page at Settings > Page Builder to configure the post types you would like it to work with.

  3. A Page Builder tab will appear on the Edit Page/Post area. Also, a Page Builder option will appear in the WordPress Admin Bar on the front end of your website.
sections.faq:
How is Offsprout better than other page builders for design agencies and freelancers?

Having come from the agency world ourselves, we know the tasks that take a long time. Offsprout focuses on centralizing design and reuse of design elements, so that sites have better design consistency and can be updated throughout with minimal effort. As just one example, Offsprout allows you to design multiple button skins that can be re-used throughout your site.

Can I white-label Offsprout?

Offsprout comes with zero branding right out of the gate. We don’t want to come between you and your clients!

short_description: Offsprout is the first WordPress page builder built specifically for design agencies and freelancers.
description:
What Is the Offsprout Page Builder?

Simply put, Offsprout is the first WordPress page builder built specifically for design agencies and freelancers. And it is white-labeled out of the box.

While every other page builder focuses on being the best tool for a non-technical person to build their own website, Offsprout’s sole focus is helping design agencies and freelancers rapidly build and manage client sites.

Offsprout Page Builder Features

  • Tons of different module types from basic text and images, to more complex feature grids and logo groups.
  • Unsplash stock photo integration with over 800,000 images
  • Centralized style management that allows to you update fonts, colors, and even button style and row/section style throughout your site from a single place
  • Saves all content as plain HTML, which means no live rendering and super-fast page load speed
  • Complex row/section backgrounds with images, gradients, image screens, and videos.
  • Mobile-friendly, responsive layouts
  • Add your own CSS
  • Does not use shortcodes to render content
  • However, you can use shortcodes in the text module and they\’ll render live in the editor
  • Works with Pages, Posts, and Custom Post Types

Offsprout Module Types

  • Text
  • Image
  • Video
  • Button

  • Quote

  • Accordion
  • Gallery

  • Separator
  • Side by Side
  • WP Widget
  • Embed
  • Shortcode (Can also use shortcodes in any text area)
  • With lots more in Pro…

Offsprout Pro

Add more module types, and control exactly what your users can edit with the Builder Role creator in Offsprout Pro upgrade.

Offsprout Theme

Design your entire site, including headers, footers, sidebars, and more. Add navigation and comments section modules. Build fully designed sites in just 5 minutes with the Site Grower with the Offsprout Theme.

upgrade_notice.2.8: 2.8 includes improvements to the workflow when switching between modules and better image module display.
upgrade_notice.2.7.2: 2.7.2 includes a fix for detecting the amount of memory templates can be allocated.
upgrade_notice.2.7.1: 2.7.1 includes a fix for creating new Structures.
upgrade_notice.2.7: 2.7 includes revamped template retrieval in preparation for the expansion of the Offsprout template library. Also includes a revamped toolbar.
upgrade_notice.2.6.3: 2.6.3 includes minor bug fixes as well as additional developer hooks. Documentation to come.
upgrade_notice.2.6: 2.6 includes Gutenberg compatibility, new lazy loading options for images and videos, a new Shortcode Module for adding more complex shortcodes (you can still add shortcodes in text), page duplication, and more, as well as some minor bug fixes.
upgrade_notice.2.5: 2.5 includes big improvements to inline text editing that allow you to click between multiple different text areas without clicking the "Done Editing Text" button and ability to add color scheme color to text selection.

upgrade_notice.2.4.1: 2.4.1 includes minor bug fixes to Side by Side and other small enhancements
upgrade_notice.2.4: 2.4 features the new Side by Side module which can be used instead of columns to put two modules side by side using their natural widths instead of percentages
upgrade_notice.2.3: 2.3 features big editing performance improvements, icons for standard settings, improvements to width resizing UX, and preparation for upcoming Offsprout WooCommerce add-on
upgrade_notice.2.2.3: 2.2.3 includes compatibility with 4.9.6's new TinyMCE version, secondary background and decorators as standard options, conditional show/hide based on logged in status, better image SEO
upgrade_notice.2.2.2: 2.2.2 includes minor bug fixes, refinements to the moving UX, better compression of stock images
upgrade_notice.2.2: 2.2 contains a number of style and UI improvements, a revamped Testimonials module, new templates, the ability to retrieve templates from a remote template site, and compatibility with Offsprout Pro and the Offsprout Theme
upgrade_notice.2.1: 2.1 contains the Offsprout Plus upgrade that introduces section divider shapes, additional icon libraries, and dozens of additional page and section templates

screenshots.caption: Edit and build your content entirely in the front end
Use page templates to get your creative juices flowing
Use row/section templates to build complete pages in a matter of seconds
Build your own content with a large variety of different content types
Edit your content and see your changes update instantly
